# CISR tutorial: Introduction to single cell RNA-seq analysis

## Instructor names and contact information:

- Rene Welch <rwelch2@wisc.edu>

## Required tools

We require to use:

- [R statistical software](https://www.r-project.org/),
- [Rstudio](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download) (not strictly necessary but the easiest alternative to work with R)
